  • Houzz

Houzz was looking for whimsical copy, so I used a fun and playful voice to provide attention-grabbing words for a wide variety of products for the home.

“Single pillow? Put a cover on it. Beyonce is a modern day icon and now you can capture the spirit of this particularly gutsy entertainer in your home with this zippered pillow cover. You're going to be crazy in love with it!”

“This lantern wouldn't be out of place in the hands of a lighthouse keeper in the midst of a turbulent storm, and it won't be out of place in the calm of your living room. With its rustic rope holder, it will add a touch of simplicity to any room without compromising anything in the way of quality.”

“MP3s may be the order of the day, but this clever little retro tape dispenser takes you back to a simpler time. Ever heard the old adage that analog just sounds better? Well, it looks better, too, with no pen-winding required.”

“Spilling will be a thing of the past with these ingenious funnel-container hybrids that hold your contents while you pour. Three different sizes ensure you can use them for all manners of liquids, batters, grains and more, while a modern, stackable design ensures they look great on your shelf.”
